title: Swara Lashes Out At Veena Malik, New Pictures From Akash Ambani's Functions And More From Ent.
text:

Hooda shared his proud moment on twitter, he wrote, “So got a silver medal at the Nationals NEC on Dream Girl thanks to my team mates from the Indian Army from RVC (Remount and Veterinary Corps) and ASC (Indian Army Service Corps). Proud moment to be given the medal by the QMG Gen Ambre with gratitude to my grooms who look after my horses”. We are equally proud of Randeep.
Amid the rising tension between both the nations, members of both Indian and Pakistan film fraternity are urging peace and not war. However, Veena Malik who loves to share her unwanted opinion is taking a dig at Indians and is shamelessly mocking about the IAF pilot who is under the custody of Pakistan.

Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta’s pre-wedding celebration in Switzerland was a grand affair. Remember at Isha Ambani’s wedding, Beyonce had a performed in a private concert for the guests. For Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta’s pre-wedding festivities, Coldplay and Chainsmokers had performed. Take a look!
“When I was on the sets, I looked at it as just another role. But, yes, I was extremely emotional when Karan (Johar) asked me to take up her role. I hope I make her proud”.
A source close to Mumbai Mirror reveals, “Farah Khan will be choreographing the song which only features Alia and the film’s team is figuring out ways to incorporate her co-stars from the first film, Varun and Sidharth, in the sequel. Both the actors are expected to shoot their portions in the coming weeks too. Alia and Tiger’s song will be shot over one week on a grand set that is being put up at a suburban studio.”
